sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react';
import { Box, Container, Grid, useMediaQuery, Modal, Button, Typography, CardActions, Card, CardContent, CardMedia } from '@mui/material';
import "./styles.css";
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import { useTheme } from '@mui/material/styles';
import MobileStepper from '@mui/material/MobileStepper';
import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper';
import headerjpg from '../assets/allbg.webp'
import OpenInNewIcon from '@mui/icons-material/OpenInNew';
import KeyboardArrowLeft from '@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowLeft';
import KeyboardArrowRight from '@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowRight';
import SwipeableViews from 'react-swipeable-views';
import { autoPlay } from 'react-swipeable-views-utils';
import { steps } from '../utils/commonHelper';
import Stepper from '@mui/material/Stepper';
import Step from '@mui/material/Step';
import StepButton from '@mui/material/StepButton';
import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade';
import Time from './time';
import Masonry from '@mui/lab/Masonry';
import AboutBg from '../assets/about_shap_bg.png'
import hire from '../assets/hire_bg.png'
import stackBg from '../assets/stackBg.png'
const AutoPlaySwipeableViews = autoPlay(SwipeableViews);


const Label = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({
  backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff',
  ...theme.typography.body2,
  padding: theme.spacing(0.5),
  textAlign: 'center',
  color: theme.palette.text.secondary,
  borderBottomLeftRadius: 0,
  borderBottomRightRadius: 0,
}));

const style = {
  position: 'absolute',
  top: '50%',
  left: '50%',
  transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
  width: 400,
  bgcolor: 'background.paper',
  border: '2px solid #000',
  boxShadow: 24,
  p: 4,
};


import redux from '../assets/react-seeklogo.com.svg' 
import reactNative from '../assets/react-native-seeklogo.com.svg'
import reduc from '../assets/redux-seeklogo.com.svg'
import mui from '../assets/material-ui-seeklogo.com.svg'
import js from '../assets/javascript-seeklogo.com.svg'
import html from '../assets/html5-seeklogo.com.svg'
import css3 from '../css-3-seeklogo.com.svg'
export const sta = [
    {
      id:0,
      icon: redux,
        // 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537944434965-cf4679d1a598?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250&q=60',
    },
    {
      id:1,
      label1: 'ğ—£ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—³ğ¢',
      description1: 
      `Parifi is Crypto Trade site with Ethereum Blockchain Decentralized ,Polygon platform for exchange,
       profitable farming using BEP-20 tokens , which holds entire concepts of block chain as trade,liquidity,
       swap,borrow,lending,deposit,withdraw,stake and governance . The site has its own token (MATIC)
       and include a two type of trades where regular Spot,Limit, and stop and other one is margin trade`,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics Where use can add and remove fund in liquidity pool for interest , 
      swap currencies , stake fund and get rewards To service trading operations, user can be borrower and 
      also lender where lender can provide fund by adding Matic inpool for some interest and borrower can use
       the fund for trade , swap and return fund with interest rate Worked close with Smart 
       contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract
       and payment integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
                imgPath:parifi,
                icon: CurrencyBitcoinIcon,
    },
    {
      id:2,
      label1: 'ğ—«ğ—£ğ—²ğ˜ ğ—šğ—®ğ—ºğ—²',
      description1: 
      `Xpet Game is an NFT site . It's a kind of cryptokitties website using Blockchain web3 concept 
      where user can buy a pet initially and can sale or breed with some other pet and give a born to 
      new pet , where the new born pet can also sell or transfer as per user choice.`,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics
      Worked close with Smart contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract and payment 
      integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend
      Handle this NFT site by coin integration where user make transaction through BNB`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
      imgPath:xpet,
      icon:PetsIcon
    },
    {
      id:3,
      label1: 'ğ—šğ—®ğ—ºğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—”ğ—¸ğ—µğ—®ğ—±ğ—®',
      description1: 
      `Gaming Akhada is a fantasy sports website like Dream11 where user can select player and create 
      a tournament with some bid amount to win , when players get high score they will get rewards as cash. 
      Where the site holds news and forums with comment section, chat with all users,players statistics
       etc..`,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,management
       and analytics Worked close with design team to optimize usability and implement frontend
      Implemented websites, mobile view, and landing pages from concept through deployment`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `React Js , HTML,CSS,Redux,Firebase,Socket`,
      imgPath:fs,
      icon:SportsEsportsIcon
    },
    {
      id:4,
      label1: 'ğ—ªğ—¶ğ˜‡ğ˜‡ğ—¼ğ—¿',
      description1: 
      `Wizzor is the educational arm of Higher Education dedicated to making Wide-Ranging mobile application for students all primary sources available on-demand to market
      RentMyGodown is a Real Estate App where users can Rent and sell Godowns
      `,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Work as part of a team to build React Native iOS / Android applications for 
      FullStack's cliets Optimizing UI/UX designs with smooth animations and transitions that
       provide an excellent user experience for both Android and
      Ios Development
      Integrate third-party API's with native modules when required`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `React - Native , Javascript , Android studio , Xcode`,
      imgPath:wizzor,
      icon:LibraryBooksIcon
    },
    {
      id:5,
      label1: 'ğ—¨ğ—±ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—®',
      description1: 
      `Udyoga is Job search Web Application where Recruiters can post a job and seekers can apply 
      jobs of the recruiters
      `,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Determining the structure and design of web pages.
      Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones
      Building reusable code for future use
      Optimizing web pages for maximum and scalability
      Makes code for jobs posting and applying jobs in application for 
      Recruiters and Seekers ,handle admin panel with PHP connecting to DB (MySql)`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `HTML , CSS, Javascript , Jquery, and PHP Developer (Basic)`,
      imgPath:udyoga,
      icon:AddBusinessIcon
    },
    {
      id:6,
      label1: 'ğ—©ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—¸ğ—®ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—»',
      description1: 
      `Velaikaaran is Service Application for Electronics which widely used
       for book a person for Repair and services
      `,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `React, Work as part of a small team to build React Native iOS / 
      Android applications for FullStack
      Optimizing UI/UX designs with smooth animations and transitions 
      that provide an excellent user experience for both Android and
      Ios Development
      Integrate third-party API's with native modules when required
      Experience on Web Services Integration (Rest) ,Json Pharsing , Node.js ,Npm and DB connection`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `React-Native , Json , Javascript , Php , codeignitor , Mysql , Android studio , Xcode`,
      imgPath:velaikkaran,
      icon:SupportAgentIcon
    },
    {
      id:7,
      label1: 'ğ—•ğ—¶ğ—±ğ—±ğ—¼ğ—»',
      description1: 
      `Biddon and PennyProBid is a Bidding application for various plots
      `,
      label2: 'ğ— ğ˜† ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—²',
      description2: `Designer & Tester
      Determining the structure and design of web pages.
      Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design
      Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones
      Building reusable code for future use
      Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability
      Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages`,
      label3: 'ğ—§ğ—²ğ—°ğ—µğ—»ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—´ğ˜† ğ—¨ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—±',
      description3: `HTML , CSS , Javascript , Jquery , Adobe Photoshop(Basic)`,
      imgPath:pennyprobid,
      icon:GavelIcon
    },
  ];
  
export default function Expertise() {
  const theme = useTheme();
  const isSxMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("xs"));
  const isSmMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("sm"));
  const isMdMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("md"));
  const isLgMatch = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down("lg"));

  return (
    <Container maxWidth={false} disableGutters sx={{ background: "#2a2a2a", 
    // backgroundImage: `url(${headerjpg})`
     }}>
        <Container maxWidth={false} disableGutters sx={{ backgroundImage: `url(${hire})`,backgroundAttachment:'fixed'}}>
      <Container sx={{ paddingTop: 5, paddingBottom: 5 }}>

        <Fade left>
          <Box sx={{ typography: isLgMatch ? 'h5' : 'h3', color: '#fff', textAlign: 'center', paddingBottom: 10 }} >Work Expertise</Box>
        </Fade>{/* <Time/> */}
        <Fade right>

          <Box sx={{
            flexGrow: 1,
          }}>

            <Grid container spacing={2} className='checkGriud'
            
            >

             

                <Grid container spacing={0}

                  className='expertise'
                  direction="column" item xs={12} lg={6} sm={6} md={6}
                  sx={{ placeSelf: 'flex-start', display: 'flex' }}>
                    <Box >
                       <Box sx={{
                       
                                margin: '0px auto',
                                width: isSmMatch?'95%':'50%',
                            }}>
                                
                                <CardMedia
                                    component="img"
                                    sx={{
                                        width: isLgMatch ? '100%' : 'auto',
                                        objectFit: 'cover',
                                        height: 350,
                                        border: '10px solid #f5af31',
                                        background:'#fff'
                                    
                                    }}
                                image={isLgMatch ? stackBg : stackBg}
                                alignItems='right'
                                alt="Live from space album cover"
              /></Box>
               </Box>

                </Grid>
                <Grid container spacing={0}

                  className='expertise'
                  direction="column" item xs={12} lg={6} sm={6} md={6}
                  sx={{ placeSelf: 'flex-start', display: 'flex' }}>
                 
                 <Fade top>
                                 <Box sx={{ typography: isLgMatch?'h6':'p', color: '#fff',textAlign:'center',paddingTop:5 }} >
                                  Obviously I'm a Front End Developer. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects.</Box></Fade>
                 
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
          </Box></Fade>
          
         
          </Container>

      </Container></Container>
  );
}
